description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: SQL Injection vulnerability in Netcome NS-ASG Application Security Gateway v.6.3.1 allows a local attacker to execute arbitrary code and obtain sensitive information via a crafted script to the loginid parameter of the /singlelogin.php component.

Vulnerabilidad de inyección SQL en Netcome NS-ASG Application Security Gateway v.6.3.1 permite a un atacante local ejecutar código arbitrario y obtener información confidencial a través de un script manipulado para el parámetro loginid del componente /singlelogin.php.
